DOC.brief_summary: Open label trial zileuton compare azathioprine/prednisone patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis . Study subject undergo detailed clinical , radiographic , physiologic assessment baseline . Subjects monitor treatment three month change symptom physiology . Subjects randomize six month treatment zileuton azathioprine/prednisone . The primary endpoint trial change LTB4 level bronchoalveolar lavage fluid follow six month treatment . Secondary endpoint progression free survival , change dyspnea , change quality life , change physiology .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis Taking < 15 mg prednisone least 30 day prior screen Age 3580 , inclusive Able understand write informed consent comply study protocol Significant environmental exposure Diagnosis collagen vascular disease Evidence active infection Clinically significant cardiac disease Myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass angioplasty within 6mo Unstable angina pectoris Congestive heart failure require hospitalization within 6 month Uncontrolled arrhythmia Poorly control severe diabetes mellitus Pregnancy lactation Women childbearing potential use medically approve mean contraception ( i.e . oral contraceptive , intrauterine device , diaphragm , Norplant ) Current enrollment another experimental protocol Physiologic Criteria : FEV1/FVC < 0.60 Laboratory Criteria : Total bilirubin > 1.5 X upper limit normal AST ALT > 3X upper limit normal Alkaline phosphatase > 3X upper limit normal White blood cell count < 2,500/mm3 Hematocrit < 30 % Platelets < 100,000/mm3 Prothrombin time INR > 1.5
